description:
Can I Show You The Easiest Way To Covert Use Hypnotic Methods That Are SO Powerful You Can Instantly DROP A Subject Into An Unexpected Trance In Moments !

Imagine having the ability to use simple covert hypnotic tricks to illicit powerful conversational trances. This program is designed to show you what it takes to master hypnotic memories and create hidden hallucination that your client can experience in seconds. You have at your finger tips a very secret and effective concept to either show people the power of hypnosis or use formally in a hypnotic interaction.

You will be introduced to :

  1. What is conversational hypnosis
  2. What is covert and hidden trances
  3. How to use conversational postulates to start the trance process
  4. How to adjust your VOICE to create unexpected trance on the spot
  5. How to master gathering attention so people hang off every word you say
  6. THE REVIV. memory method
  7. Eliciting powerful memories that a client can experienced as if were real again
If you were looking for a simple and effective idea based on conversational hypnosis and are SICK of learning language patterns. THIS is for you. No language patterns will be needed.
title: The Amazing Guide To Covert And Conversational Trance
